text: Morgan Harper is a New Zealander professional rugby league footballer who plays as a for the Manly Warringah Sea Eagles in the National Rugby League (NRL). ==Background== Harper was born in Hamilton, New Zealand. He played his junior rugby league for the Ngaruawahia Panthers in the Waikato Rugby League. ==Career== Harper made his NRL debut for Canterbury-Bankstown against the Brisbane Broncos in round 25 of the 2019 NRL season. In round 17 of the 2020 NRL season, Harper scored two tries for Manly-Warringah in a 34-32 defeat against the Wests Tigers at Brookvale Oval. ==References== ==External links== *Canterbury-Bankstown Bulldogs profile Category:1998 births Category:New Zealand rugby league players Category:Canterbury-Bankstown Bulldogs players Category:Rugby league centres Category:Living people
title: Morgan Harper
